Uses of Package
gui

Packages that use gui
Package
Description
control
 
gui
 
  • Classes in gui used by control
    Class
    Description
    GraphStreamReachabilityGraph
    A GraphStream implementation of ReachabilityGraph.
    MainFrame
    This is the main frame of the program.
    PetrinetGraph
    Interface for a graph representing a petrinet.
    PetrinetMenuController
    An interface defining methods for entries in PetrinetMenu.
    PetrinetToolbarController
    A controller defining methods used by a petrinet toolbar.
    ResizableSplitPane
    A subclass of JSplitPane but the divider stays in place even if the parent container is resized.
    ToolbarMode
    An enum representing the two modes the toolbar can be in: VIEWER and EDITOR.
  • Classes in gui used by gui
    Class
    Description
    GraphStreamReachabilityGraph
    A GraphStream implementation of ReachabilityGraph.
    MainFrame
    This is the main frame of the program.
    PetrinetGraph
    Interface for a graph representing a petrinet.
    PetrinetMenuController
    An interface defining methods for entries in PetrinetMenu.
    PetrinetToolbar
    A toolbar for interactions with petrinets via a PetrinetToolbarController representing the current state of a PetrinetPanelInterface.
    ResizableSplitPane
    A subclass of JSplitPane but the divider stays in place even if the parent container is resized.
    ToolbarImage
    An enum listing all available ToolbarImages and defining their name for the file in the IMAGE_ROOT_FOLDER (originally obtained from iconoir.com).
    ToolbarMode
    An enum representing the two modes the toolbar can be in: VIEWER and EDITOR.
